sharedDrive.description: This folder is used for automated integration testing. Test files are created and cleaned up automatically.

setup: 1. Copy this file to 'test-config.json' in the same directory
2. Replace 'testFolderId' with your Shared Drive folder ID
3. Ensure you have OAuth credentials configured
4. Run 'npm run test:integration' to execute tests
instructions.note: test-config.json is gitignored to protect your Shared Drive configuration
